name: @orzubek/envloader
description: load environment files as js objects

scripts.publish-lib: npm run test && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-beta: npm run test && npm run build && npm publish --access public --tag beta
scripts.publish-dryrun: npm run test && npm run build && npm publish --access public --dry-run

author: Orzubek Rakhimov
